mapper.sql: id, ticket_num, ticket_in_time, ticket_state, create_time, update_time, ticket_out_time, store_account_id, ticket_validity_start, ticket_validity_end, customer_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tickets
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tickets (id, ticket_num, ticket_in_time, ticket_state, create_time, update_time, ticket_out_time, store_account_id, ticket_validity_start, ticket_validity_end, customer_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ticketNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ticketState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ticketOutTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ticketValidityStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ticketValidityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into tickets
id,
ticket_num,
ticket_in_time,
ticket_state,
create_time,
update_time,

insert into tickets (id,ticket_num, ticket_in_time,ticket_state, create_time) values
(#{ticket.ticketNum},#{ticket.ticketNum},#{ticket.ticketInTime},#{ticket.ticketState},#{ticket.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as total, count(case when ticket_state = '已入库' then 1 end) AS in_num, count(case when ticket_state = '已下发' then 1 end) AS out_num, count(case when ticket_state = '已销售' then 1 end) AS sale_num, count(case when ticket_state = '已挂失' then 1 end) AS lost_num, count(case when ticket_state = '已过期' then 1 end) AS outtime_num FROM tickets
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_num >= CONVERT(#{beginNum},UNSIGNED INT) AND ticket_num <= CONVERT(#{endNum},UNSIGNED INT);
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_num >= CONVERT(#{beginNum},UNSIGNED INT) AND ticket_num <= CONVERT(#{endNum},UNSIGNED INT) AND ticket_state = #{state}

SELECT count(*) as total, count(case when ticket_state = '已下发' then 1 end) AS out_num, count(case when ticket_state = '已销售' then 1 end) AS sale_num, count(case when ticket_state = '已挂失' then 1 end) AS lost_num, count(case when ticket_state = '已过期' then 1 end) AS outtime_num FROM tickets where store_account_id = #{storeAccountId}
